alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafourche and southeastern Jefferson Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Myrtle Grove, or 15 miles east of Galliano. This storm was moving slowly south at 5 to 10 MPH. This SPS does not include Grand Isle at this time. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Lafourche and southeastern Jefferson Parishes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche
